actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to require comprehensive health insurance coverage for childhood immunization.
short_title: Comprehensive Insurance Coverage of Childhood Immunization Act of 2001

summary.text: Comprehensive Insurance Coverage of Childhood Immunization Act of 2001 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code to require comprehensive health insurance coverage for childhood immunization to be provided by health plans and insurance issuers in both group and individual markets.

titles.title: Comprehensive Insurance Coverage of Childhood Immunization Act of 2001
A bill to require comprehensive health insurance coverage for childhood immunization.
